description: Improper access control vulnerability in Hot Pepper Gourmet App for Android ver.4.111.0 and earlier, and for iOS ver.4.111.0 and earlier allows a remote attacker to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: for Android ver.4.111.0 and earlier, and for iOS ver.4.111.0 and earlier
